name: BountyHeart Prototype
description:
BountyHeart is a mobile match 3 tactical RPG being developed in USC's AGP (Advanced Games Project) class next year. This is the prototype that got my pitch greenlit for AGP.

music: https://pudretediablo.itch.io/snes-bgm-1

If you played it please give me feedback here : https://forms.gle/hTLocvAP4urQcqkf7

I'll update this page as the game gets developed next year.
